title: Agent of Record (AOR) Guide: Setting the Foundation for a Stronger Workforce
summary:
Struggling to manage independent contractors while staying compliant? Learn how an Agent of Record (AOR) can streamline contractor engagement, reduce risk, and support a smarter workforce strategy.
The post Agent of Record (AOR) Guide: Setting the Foundation for a Stronger Workforce appeared first on MBO Partners.
